dict.string:
Bodyweight Strength: 30 - 60 sec rest inbetween sets
1. Plank x as long as possible - 3 sets 2. Superman x 10 - 3 sets 3. Bodyweight squat x 10 - 3 sets 4. Bodyweight forward or reverse lunge x 10 / side - 3 sets 5. Push-up x as many as possible - 3 sets

Bodyweight Strength: 30 - 60 sec rest inbetween sets
1. Walk-out to push-up x 5 - 5 sets 2. Cossack squat/lateral lunge x 5 side - 3 sets 3. Single-leg deadlift & stretch x 6-8 side - 3 sets 4. Repeat 2x

Bodyweight Strength: 30 - 60 sec rest inbetween sets
1. Spidermans x 8 side - 3 sets 2. Inchworms x 8 side - 3 sets 3. Pinwheel shinbox x 8 side - sets 4. Thread the needle x 8 side - 3 sets 5. Repeat 2x

Bodyweight Strength: 30 - 60 sec rest inbetween sets
1. Plank x as long as possible - 3 sets 2. Superman x 10 - 3 sets 3. Bodyweight squat x 10 - 3 sets 4. Bodyweight forward or reverse lunge x 10 / side - 3 sets 5. Push-up x as many as possible - 3 sets
